GGMncv 2.0.0
  • Reference

Confirm Edges

Source: R/confirm_edges.R
confirm_edges.Rd

Confirmatory testing of edges detected with data-driven model selection in an independent dataset.

confirm_edges(object, Rnew, method, alpha)

Arguments

object

An object of classo ggmncv
Rnew

Matrix. A correlation matrix of dimensions p by p.
method

Character string. A correction method for multiple comparison (defaults to fdr). Can be abbreviated. See p.adjust.
alpha

Numeric. Significance level (defaults to 0.05).

Value

An object of class ggmncv

Examples

Y <- na.omit(bfi[,1:25])

Y_explore <- Y[1:1000,]

Y_confirm <- Y[1001:nrow(Y),]

fit <- ggmncv(cor(Y_explore),
              n = nrow(Y_explore))
#> selecting lambda

confirm <- confirm_edges(fit,
                         Rnew = cor(Y_confirm),
                         method = "fdr",
                         alpha = 0.05)
